0: The gym only had a treadmill and one elliptical working
did not use dry sauna or fitness center
I hoped to use the steam room as advertised on the website but apparently it is only in the mens dressing room the womans has a sauna but heat is turned off so not too convenient to use briefly
Gym also is very up to date as all the equipment works as it should
Ended up skipping my workouts because of my schedule
The power to the 3 treadmills went out while I was running
We made use of the gym which was quite good for a hotel gym but could use a bit of an update the posters on the walls were quite obviously from the 90s and the enamel on the weights was flaking off
No room available upon arrival and broken treadmills
Twenty minutes into my treadmill run all the cardio machines in the gym shut off without any forewarning nearly shooting me and my fellow early morning joggers into the wall behind us
I did not really check out the restaurant or fitness facilities but I would imagine they would be great
1: But the Gym was clean and nice
The gym was excellent and the meeting rooms were very nice
The fitness centre is good has everything you could need and is very clean
It also has a good size gym

Everyone at the hotel was amazing they helped me so much I was in a very enjoyable stay especially concierge counter KAOUTHARThe hotel was very beautiful very elegant great location am very clean very bright a great fitness center I ca n’t wait to come back and visit again
Was able to workout daily and easy access to work location in mid town
The rooms were large and beautiful the fitness facility was clean and big and the executive lounge was well done and well stocked
The lobby and lounge were gorgeous and the gym was everything you could ask for
The hotel is well appointed with a very nice gym the most comfy beds beautiful bathrooms nice showers with excellent water pressure and multiple settings for the shower
Perfect location for all our activity the food and drinks in the restaurant was reasonably priced and a good verity of choices
